text.__SUMMARY__:
Lithocarpus indutus is a species of plant in the family Fagaceae. Some common names it goes by are bataruwa, pasang bodas, and pasang balung.
It is a tree endemic to Java in Indonesia.  It is a vulnerable species threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Lithocarpus indutus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31990A9668174. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31990A9668174.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
